title: STOP Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Reflective Practice
exercises.description: Recall a recent moment when emotions ran high. Write down how using the STOP skill might have changed the outcome and what you learned.

exercises.title: STOP Drill
exercises.description: Practice each step of STOP during low-stress situations, like deciding what to eat or responding to a text. Build familiarity for when it's needed most.

exercises.title: Mindful Pause Timer
exercises.description: Set timer for one minute and practice stopping everything. Focus solely on breath and surroundings, observing how it feels to pause completely.

exercises.title: Role-Play Exercise
exercises.description: With trusted friend or therapist, rehearse using STOP in hypothetical scenarios (receiving critical feedback). Practice makes it more natural.

exercises.title: Be Patient With Yourself
exercises.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
